name: Dunk Kids
description: The game focuses on basketball played by Japanese junior teams. The game can be played with one or two players in either the Tournament or Free Play modes. The teams that can be selected are Tokyo, Okinawa, Osaka and Kanagawa, each consisting of two members. Different teams have their own skill levels of Defense, Passing and Strategy. The gameplay is done on one section of the field, where the player has to score more points than the opposing team in three minutes. In the Tournament Mode, the player must beat the three local Japanese teams then process to beat other teams worldwide.
